//J B WS  ALUop  RA1   RA2   const   WA
  0 0 00  00000000000000011111111   00001 // x1 = 00ff
  0 0 00  00000001111111100000000   00010 // x2 = ff00
  0 0 10  00000000000000000000000   00011 // x3 = sw_i
  0 0 00  00000000000000000001000   01000 // x8 = 8
  0 0 00  00000000000000000000000   00101 // x5 = 0
  0 0 00  00000000000000000000000   00110 // x6 = 0
  0 0 00  00000000000000000000000   00111 // x7 = 0
  0 0 01  00111 00011 00001 00000000  00110 // x6 = x3 & x1
  0 0 01  00001 00110 01000 00000000  00110 // x6 = x6 << x8
  0 0 01  00110 00101 00110 00000000  00101 // x5 = x5 | x6
  0 0 01  00111 00011 00010 00000000  00111 // x7 = x3 & x2
  0 0 01  00101 00111 01000 00000000  00111 // x7 = x7 >> x8
  0 0 01  00111 00111 00001 00000000  00111 // x7 = x7 & x1
  0 0 01  00110 00101 00111 00000000  00101 // x5 = x5 | x7
  1 0 00  00000 00101 00000 00000000  00000 // out_o = x5
